title: How to unsubscribe from Perplexity AI
description: Learn how to cancel your Perplexity AI subscription through the website, iOS App Store, Android Google Play Store, or by contacting support. Remember that deleting your account does not cancel your subscription.

steps_1.title: Cancel Perplexity AI Subscription via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Perplexity AI subscription via the website, follow these steps:

*   Log in to your Perplexity AI account at perplexity.ai.
*   Go to Settings by clicking on your profile icon.
*   Navigate to the Subscription or Billing section.
*   Find the option to Cancel Subscription and click it.
*   Follow any on-screen prompts to confirm your cancellation.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.
